      • processUsers

        public List<Integer> processUsers(String processingFlag,
                                  Integer numberOfUsersToProcess)
        This method is used to define three ways to process user. Where s means process the user from beginning, e from the end, and r is in random order.
        Specified by:
        processUsers in interface TwitterGraph
        Parameters:
        processingFlag - a character from s, e, r
        numberOfUsersToProcess - number of users you need to process to make recommendation
        Returns:
        the users list
